code: import axios from'axios';axios.defaults.baseURL='https://661bf640e7b95ad7fa6966ae.mockapi.io/advert';export const getCampers=async function(){let page=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1;const data=await axios.get("/adverts/?page=".concat(page,"&limit=4"));return data;};
